title: Firefox DevTools showing inconsistent behavior with scroll-linked animations using ViewTimeline API
content:
Hi everyone,

We‚Äôre testing scroll-linked animations on a landing page built with Tailwind and custom JS for our client project hosted at https://noveltyads.com. Specifically, we‚Äôre exploring the ViewTimeline API and CSS animation-timeline for a horizontal scroll section.

While everything works smoothly in Chromium-based browsers, we‚Äôve noticed Firefox behaves inconsistently in the following ways:

The animation-timeline: view() property doesn‚Äôt always trigger on scroll as expected.

Debugging with Firefox DevTools, the animations don‚Äôt appear in the Animation panel at all.

We confirmed that no polyfills or fallbacks are interfering.

This is happening on a custom-built section on this live test page: https://noveltyads.com (it‚Äôs a mock client version for internal QA ‚Äî nothing behind a paywall or login).

Has anyone experienced similar behavior with Firefox‚Äôs scroll-driven animations or ViewTimeline implementation?

We‚Äôd love to know:

Whether Firefox fully supports ViewTimeline (or still considers it experimental)

Any DevTools flags or settings needed to see scroll animations properly

If there's a better way to ensure cross-browser consistency using native APIs

Thanks a lot for your help and insights!

‚Äî Usama
creator: usamasuffian

title: Cannot access "X" sites anymore
content:
Since the last Firefox update I cannot access sites such as Chaturbate or Myfreecams anymore with error message :

"Hmm. We‚Äôre having trouble finding that site. We can‚Äôt connect to the server at chaturbate.com."

There seems to be a DNS issue. I tried everything I found online such as desactivate DNS over HTTPS and others but I just cannot access these. Firefox works for "normal" sites and all other browsers (Edge, Oasis, Brave, etc) work fine now but I had to change the DNS after their last update (everyone created a problem from last week, so strange).

Another very strange thing is when I use a VPN, even with my country to access from, it is working !!!

What can be the issue and how to solve it ? Thanks
creator: mweb00
